function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Potential for infection spreading in office buildings and workplaces","Impact":"Uncontrolled spread of COVID-19 among employees and workers","Mitigation":"Implementing protective and preventive measures to reduce transmission","Technologies":"Air filtration systems, UV-C disinfection, contactless technology","People":"Employees, workers, managers","Owner":"Companies, government agencies"},{"Description":"Deficiencies in office buildings and layouts contributing to infection spreading propensity","Impact":"Increased risk of COVID-19 transmission due to poorly designed spaces","Mitigation":"Redesigning office layouts for better airflow and distancing","Technologies":"Simulation software for airflow analysis, flexible workspace design","People":"Architects, building designers, facilities managers","Owner":"Building owners, companies"},{"Description":"Inadequate COVID-19 regulations and guidelines in offices","Impact":"Lack of effective safety measures leading to higher infection rates","Mitigation":"Strict adherence to updated and comprehensive COVID-19 guidelines","Technologies":"Contact tracing apps, temperature screening devices","People":"Policymakers, government agencies","Owner":"Government, public health authorities"}]}
